text: Hajisakalaka pani pana karaoraa arau machajidula haraamara tatbaradhana karaa karyaka tomaloke se'i byaktira darae dharana karaa neki, yiye allaha arau sesa dirasara prati imana aniche arau allahara pathata jihada karaiche? Sihamta allahara ocarata samana nahaya. Arau allahe yalima sampradayaka hidayata nakarae
